Throws if the the recipient share mantissa calculation has a math error.","params":{"deposit":"The amount of money to be streamed.","recipient":"The address towards which the money is streamed.","recipientSharePercentage":"The recipient's share of the interest, as a percentage.","senderSharePercentage":"The sender's share of the interest, as a percentage.","startTime":"The unix timestamp for when the stream starts.","stopTime":"The unix timestamp for when the stream stops.","tokenAddress":"The ERC20 token to use as streaming currency."},"return":"The uint256 id of the newly created compounding stream."},"createStream(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Throws if paused. Throws if the recipient is the zero address, the contract itself or the caller. Throws if the deposit is 0. Throws if the start time is before `block.timestamp`. Throws if the stop time is before the start time. Throws if the duration calculation has a math error. Throws if the deposit is smaller than the duration. Throws if the deposit is not a multiple of the duration. Throws if the rate calculation has a math error. Throws if the next stream id calculation has a math error. Throws if the contract is not allowed to transfer enough tokens. Throws if there is a token transfer failure.","params":{"deposit":"The amount of money to be streamed.","recipient":"The address towards which the money is streamed.","startTime":"The unix timestamp for when the stream starts.","stopTime":"The unix timestamp for when the stream stops.","tokenAddress":"The ERC20 token to use as streaming currency."},"return":"The uint256 id of the newly created stream."},"deltaOf(uint256)":{"details":"Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.","params":{"streamId":"The id of the stream for whom to query the delta."},"return":"The time delta in seconds."},"getCompoundingStream(uint256)":{"details":"Throws if the id does not point to a valid compounding stream.","params":{"streamId":"The id of the compounding stream to query."},"return":"The compounding stream object."},"getEarnings(address)":{"params":{"tokenAddress":"The address of the token to get the earnings for."},"return":"The amount of interest as uint256."},"getStream(uint256)":{"details":"Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.","params":{"streamId":"The id of the stream to query."},"return":"The stream object."},"initialize(address)":{"details":"Initializes the contract in unpaused state. nodes.name: cancelCompoundingStreamInternal

balanceOf(uint256,address).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream for whom to query the balance.
params.who: The address for whom to query the balance.

balanceOf(uint256,address).return: The total funds allocated to `who` as uint256.

cancelStream(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream. Throws if the caller is not the sender or the recipient of the stream. Throws if there is a token transfer failure.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to cancel.

createCompoundingStream(address,uint256,.details: Inherits all security checks from `createStream`. Throws if the cToken is not whitelisted. Throws if the sender share percentage and the recipient share percentage do not sum up to 100. Throws if the the sender share mantissa calculation has a math error. Throws if the the recipient share mantissa calculation has a math error.

params.deposit: The amount of money to be streamed.
params.recipient: The address towards which the money is streamed.
params.recipientSharePercentage: The recipient's share of the interest, as a percentage.
params.senderSharePercentage: The sender's share of the interest, as a percentage.
params.startTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream starts.
params.stopTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream stops.
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token to use as streaming currency.

createCompoundingStream(address,uint256,.return: The uint256 id of the newly created compounding stream.

createStream(address,uint256,address,uin.details: Throws if paused. Throws if the recipient is the zero address, the contract itself or the caller. Throws if the deposit is 0. Throws if the start time is before `block.timestamp`. Throws if the stop time is before the start time. Throws if the duration calculation has a math error. Throws if the deposit is smaller than the duration. Throws if the deposit is not a multiple of the duration. Throws if the rate calculation has a math error. Throws if the next stream id calculation has a math error. Throws if the contract is not allowed to transfer enough tokens. Throws if there is a token transfer failure.

params.deposit: The amount of money to be streamed.
params.recipient: The address towards which the money is streamed.
params.startTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream starts.
params.stopTime: The unix timestamp for when the stream stops.
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token to use as streaming currency.

createStream(address,uint256,address,uin.return: The uint256 id of the newly created stream.

deltaOf(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream for whom to query the delta.

getCompoundingStream(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid compounding stream.

params.streamId: The id of the compounding stream to query.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to get the earnings for.

getEarnings(address).return: The amount of interest as uint256.

getStream(uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream.

params.streamId: The id of the stream to query.

initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state. Assigns the Pauser role to the deployer.

interestOf(uint256,uint256).details: Throws if there is a math error. We do not assert the calculations which involve the current exchange rate, because we can't know what value we'll get back from the cToken contract.
interestOf(uint256,uint256).return: The interest accrued by the sender, the recipient and sablier, respectively, as uint256s.

params.streamId: The id of the compounding stream to check.

isCompoundingStream(uint256).return: bool true=it is compounding stream, otherwise false.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

takeEarnings(address,uint256).details: Throws if `amount` exceeds the available balance.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to withdraw earnings for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

updateFee(uint256).details: Throws if the caller is not the owner of the contract. Throws if `feePercentage` is not lower or equal to 100.

params.feePercentage: The new fee as a percentage.

withdrawFromStream(uint256,uint256).details: Throws if the id does not point to a valid stream. Throws if the caller is not the sender or the recipient of the stream. Throws if the amount exceeds the available balance. Throws if there is a token transfer failure.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.streamId: The id of the stream to withdraw tokens from.

balanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Returns the available funds for the given stream id and address.

cancelStream(uint256).notice: Cancels the stream and transfers the tokens back on a pro rata basis.

createCompoundingStream(address,uint256,.notice: Creates a new compounding stream funded by `msg.sender` and paid towards `recipient`.

createStream(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Creates a new stream funded by `msg.sender` and paid towards `recipient`.

deltaOf(uint256).notice: Returns either the delta in seconds between `block.timestamp` and `startTime` or between `stopTime` and `startTime, whichever is smaller. If `block.timestamp` is before `startTime`, it returns 0.

getCompoundingStream(uint256).notice: Returns the compounding stream object with all its properties.

getEarnings(address).notice: Returns the amount of interest that has been accrued for the given token address.

getStream(uint256).notice: Returns the compounding stream with all its properties.

interestOf(uint256,uint256).notice: Computes the interest accrued by keeping the amount of tokens in the contract. Returns (0, 0, 0) if the stream is not a compounding stream.

isCompoundingStream(uint256).notice: Checks if the given id points to a compounding stream.

takeEarnings(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws the earnings for the given token address.

withdrawFromStream(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws from the contract to the recipient's account.
